title: Hi. My pixel 2 died. Warranty replaced. How do I disable my old myki mobile to reload on new ph?
content: How do I disable a Myki mobile account set up in Google pay when the original account was on a pixel 2 that was replaced under warranty after the ph just stopped.  Is I can't go in and disable the old Myki mobile in Google pay as it is device specific.  Until I disable the old Myki on Google pay I can't install a new Google pay on my replacement pixel 2.  How?
